 DRY-RUN MODE -  Container testdata-additional-1  Stopping
 DRY-RUN MODE -  Container testdata-additional-1  Stopped
 DRY-RUN MODE -  Container testdata-additional-1  Removing
 DRY-RUN MODE -  Container testdata-additional-1  Removed
 DRY-RUN MODE -  Container testdata-sample_service-1  Recreate
 DRY-RUN MODE -  Container testdata-sample_service-1  Recreated
